sentence.Network_en: We see it in the history of Andalusia and Cordoba during the Inquisition.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一点我们在宗教法庭时期安达鲁西亚(Andalusia) 和科尔多瓦(Cordoba)的历史上看得很清楚.

sentence.Network_en: Book online the cheapest hotels in Andalusia - low prices and high discounts.
sentence.Network_cn: 网上预定在安达卢西亚最便宜的酒店 - 价格优惠折扣多多.

sentence.Network_en: What could be more fascinating than a leisurely trip through the countryside of Andalusia?
sentence.Network_cn: 有什么比安达卢西亚惬意之旅更令人留恋?

means.word_mean: 1. a region in southern Spain on the Atlantic and the Mediterranean; formerly a center of Moorish civilization

auth_sentence.content: It goes without saying that Baghdad and Alexandria, Cairo, Andalusia and Persia were the seats of learning.
